### operator^=() {#a0fddc5e209f863af9d7956c6ef451bfa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>IntegerRangeState llvm::IntegerRangeState::operator^= (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/integerrangestate">IntegerRangeState</a> &amp; R)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
&quot;Clamp&quot; this state with <code>R</code>.

The result is subtype dependent but it is intended that only information assumed in both states will be assumed in this one afterwards.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l03030">3030</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
